org.qualitune.jouleunit
Class CompositeJouleProfiler

java.lang.Object
  org.qualitune.jouleunit.AbstractProfilerNTimes
      org.qualitune.jouleunit.CompositeJouleProfiler
All Implemented Interfaces:
JouleProfiler
public class CompositeJouleProfiler
extends AbstractProfilerNTimes

Composite JouleProfiler implementation to support profiling of multiple devices in parallel.

Author:
Claas Wilke

calibrate

public void calibrate()
Description copied from interface: JouleProfiler
Calibrates the JouleProfiler for the platform under test (used to measure the minimum refresh interval for power rate values etc.).

endProfiling

public EnergyProfile endProfiling()
                           throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
Description copied from interface: JouleProfiler
Ends the profiling of this JouleProfiler. If profiling has not been started before, an IllegalStateException is expected to be thrown.

Returns:
The EnergyProfile of the profiling.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown, if profiling has not been initialized (using JouleProfiler.startProfiling()).

getEstimatedBaseConsumption

public long getEstimatedBaseConsumption()
Description copied from interface: JouleProfiler
Returns the estimated base noise of this JouleProfiler in mW. The base noise is the energy consumption caused by the device under profiling without executing an application.

getEstimatedProbeEffect

public long getEstimatedProbeEffect()
Description copied from interface: JouleProfiler
Returns the estimated probe effect of this JouleProfiler in mW. The probe effect is the energy consumption caused by this JouleProfiler itself during profiling.

getProfilingInterval

public float getProfilingInterval()
Description copied from interface: JouleProfiler
Returns how often (in Hz) this JouleProfiler will profile the energy consumption.

Returns:
How often the energy consumption will be measured (in Hz).

isCalibrated

public boolean isCalibrated()
Description copied from interface: JouleProfiler
Indicates whether or not this JouleProfiler has been already calibrated.

isProfiling

public boolean isProfiling()
Description copied from interface: JouleProfiler
Indicates whether or not this JouleProfiler is currently profiling.

Returns:
true if profiling is running.

logEvent

public void logEvent(java.lang.String identifier)
Description copied from interface: JouleProfiler
Logs a given event for this JouleProfiler. An event consists of an identifier that must be unique within the currently profiled EnergyProfile. Events can be used to separate the EnergyProfile into multiple parts, for which individual energy consumptions can be computed. E.g., this can be used to log the begin or end of the specific method's invocation during testing.

Parameters:
identifier - The identifier of the event (Must be unique within the EnergyProfile!).

setBaseConsumptionConsiderationEnabled

public void setBaseConsumptionConsiderationEnabled(boolean enable)
Description copied from interface: JouleProfiler
Enables or disables this JouleProfiler to consider the device's base noise (or base power rate) during profiling. If enabled, the base noise will subtracted from each PowerRate profiled with this JouleProfiler.

Parameters:
enable - If true base noise consideration is enabled (default is true).

setEstimationInterval

public void setEstimationInterval(int interval)
Description copied from interface: JouleProfiler
Sets the length in seconds used for each iteration in the calibration/estimation phase. E.g., to compute the probe effect.

Parameters:
interval - Length in seconds used for each iteration in the calibration/estimation phase. E.g., to compute the probe effect.

setProbeEffectConsiderationEnabled

public void setProbeEffectConsiderationEnabled(boolean enable)
Description copied from interface: JouleProfiler
Enables or disables this JouleProfiler to consider its probe effect during profiling. If enabled, the probe effect will subtracted from each PowerRate profiled with this JouleProfiler.

Parameters:
enable - If true probe effect consideration is enabled (default is true).

setProfilingInterval

public void setProfilingInterval(int interval)
Description copied from interface: JouleProfiler
Configures how often (in milliseconds) this JouleProfiler will profile the energy consumption.

Parameters:
interval - How often the energy consumption will be measured (in milliseconds).

startProfiling

public void startProfiling()
Description copied from interface: JouleProfiler
Starts the profiling of this JouleProfiler.
